title: Ok. I guess we'll talk about the metaverse.
description:
What is the metaverse? How do you get to it? Why does it seem to dominate headlines every week? Is it possibly a sign of our dystopian future? Sam learns all about the metaverse and more with NPR technology correspondent Shannon Bond and NPR tech reporter Bobby Allyn. They define the metaverse, explain why companies are so eager to jump into it, and whether or not we should worry about it.

You can follow us on Twitter @NPRItsBeenAMin and email us at samsanders@npr.org.
